pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Joint Test-Statistic for the Null of Non-Cointegration // Implements a joint cointegration testing approach that combines Engle-Granger, Johansen maximum eigenvalue, Boswijk, and Banerjee tests into a unified test-statistic for the null of non-cointegration. Also see Bayer and Hanck (2013) doi:10.1111/j.1467-9892.2012.00814.x.
